sentences.sContent: We learned all the tricks of privatization.
sentences.sContent_eng: We learned all the tricks of privatization.
sentences.sCn: 我们学到了私有化的所有技巧。

sentences.sContent: The household contract responsibility system does not mean privatization of the rural economy.
sentences.sContent_eng: The household contract responsibility system does not mean privatization of the rural economy.
sentences.sCn: 家庭联产承包制并不意味着农村经济私有化。

sentences.sContent: Outside the World Water Forum, hundreds of protesters demonstrated against what they call the "privatization" of water.
sentences.sContent_eng: Outside the World Water Forum, hundreds of protesters demonstrated against what they call the "privatization" of water.
sentences.sCn: 在世界水论坛的会场外面，数百名抗议者举行示威，反对他们所说的“水资源私有化”。

words.tran: 私掠船；武装民船；私掠船船长；私掠船船员
